content: **gauge** 20 sts x 31 row = 4 / 10 cm in stockinette stitch in the round unblocked **needles** us 6 / 4 0 mm or size needed for gauge 16 / 40 cm and 32 / 80 cm circular needles dpns optional **tools** stitch markers qty 9 including 1 unique marker for your bor scrap yarn or stitch holders qty 2 tapestry needle **techiniques** knitting in round knit purl german short row details included increases decreases yarnover thank you to all my amazing test knitters for sharing their time and talents 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/knit-pro 2 https //www knitterspride com/blog/knit-along-with-us-the-summer-tee/ 3 https //www ravelry com/discuss/knitters-pride/4140624/1-25 4 https //www knitpro eu/weblink 5 https //www ravelry com/discuss/my-knitpro/4141262/1-25
